title: Hello
text:
Welcome to my page!

About Me
I’m an insurance professional pursuing a Master of Science in Insurance Management with a concentration in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University.


Portfolio
This site will feature my ongoing academic projects during my studies.

title: About
text:
As I continue progressing towards the completion of my degree this site will serve as a source for my key academic projects as well as show my status in the program.

Courses
import pandas as pd


Create DataFrame
courses = { “Course Name”: [ “Cloud Analytics for Business”, “Project Management”, “Financial Concepts”, “Enterprise Risk Management”, “Quantitative and Qualitative Decision Making”, “Business Analytics Foundations” ], “Course Status”: [ “Current”, “Completed”, “Completed”, “Completed”, “Completed”, “Completed” ] }
df = pd.DataFrame(courses)


Use Styler to center headers and cells, hide index
styled_df = df.style.set_table_styles( [ {‘selector’: ‘th’, ‘props’: [ (‘text-align’, ‘center’), (‘background-color’, ‘#A0C1E8’), # lighter navy blue (‘color’, ‘black’), (‘font-weight’, ‘bold’), (‘padding’, ‘8px’) ]}, {‘selector’: ‘td’, ‘props’: [ (‘text-align’, ‘center’), (‘color’, ‘black’), (‘padding’, ‘6px’) ]} ] ).hide(axis=“index”) # hides the 0-5 index column


Display table in Quarto
styled_df
